main event: Three unidentified objects were observed emitting brilliant white light over Connersville, Indiana on 21 July 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes and the objects appeared to move in an oval course., Witnesses described the object as circular and stationary at first before making a 90-degree turn., There were no photographs or physical evidence documented., The objects were initially seen as brilliant, bright, yellowish lights., The estimated speed of the objects was around 500 m.p.h.
witness description: Civilian observer who described the movement of the objects.
